page.title: 03A Stonegate Family's Day
page.content:
This family consists of a father and mother,sons aged 12 and 10 years,and a daughter aged 3 years.This account is written by the 10 year old son.
At 7.30am I woke up.My sister came into my room and climbed on to the bunk above mine.At 7.45am my mother, father and sister got up. My father and I ate our breakfasts while my mother washed and dressed.At 8am my brother came in for breakfast.We all washed and dressed ready for school and work.My father went to lecture at college,my mother to teach in a primary school,my brother to the local secondary school,my sister to a playgroup,while I went to primary school in Stonegate.After school we had tea and watched T.V. At 6pm my brother went to Youth Club and I went to Cubs.
